name: Jeus
description:
Jeus

You are the God of Juice, revered and feared by the world. But a god is sustained by their devotees, so in order for you to live your followers must die and surrender their delicious juice.

This game was made in a week for the Juice Game Jam 2023 with the theme of "Pay the Price"

Designed By Hayden Sigal and Lexy Graves

Produced by Lexy Graves

Programmed by Skyler Zartman

Audio Composed by Sean Smeed and Forrest Yang

Art by Aya Aziz
